item.title: Git
item.description: Git is a free & open source, distributed version (revision) control system created by Linus Torvalds. Every Git clone is a full-fledged [in svk: ucelený, kompletný] repository with complete history and full revision tracking capabilities, not dependent on network access or a central server. Branching and merging are fast and easy to do. Git uses an intelligent compression system to reduce the cost of storing the entire history. First-Time Git Setup Introduce yourself to git with your name and public email address before doing any operation:
